name: Solitaire - Free Classic Klondike Solitaire
description:
Solitaire by YesGnome is the best free classic solitaire available for iPhone and iPad. Experience the windows solitaire you used to play on computer now on device. Solitaire or Patience is a card game that can be played by a single player. The game consists of two modes one is classic solitaire and other is lucky mode where you get a bonus wheel at the end of the game which multiplies the winning amount.

Features:

• Classic game play
• Beautiful theme specific graphics
• Smart tap, drag & drop
• Draw 1 card
• Draw 3 cards
• Classic Mode
• Vegas Mode
• Hints for free
• Undo for free
• Powerup’s
• Daily Bonus
• Auto Complete to finish game
